Author: Microsoft Developer
Description:
In this episode of the Azure Essentials show, Catherine and Chris from Microsoft Finance break down how to evaluate cloud and technology investments using key financial metrics. They explain the fundamentals of Net Present Value (NPV) and Return on Investment (ROI), walk through practical examples, and discuss how to make informed decisions in environments with limited resources. The session is tailored for engineers and developers who want to better understand the financial reasoning behind technology investment choices.

By watching this episode, you will ...
- learn the basics around how to calculate and interpret NPV and ROI for technology investments.
- understand the importance of modeling both costs and benefits, and considering strategic and intangible value, when evaluating investments.
- gain insights into making investment decisions by considering trade-offs, risks, and alignment with organizational strategy.
